entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TarReader throws on various archives that other tools accept #74316
  • Start time regressions on windows across many TE benchmarks #74315
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator returns warnings with the .NET 6 and 7 SDK #74310
  • TarReader fails to read tar file with hardlinks; throws System.IO.EndOfStreamException #74309
  • [API Proposal]: MakeWeakTypeReference as trimming indicator #74307
  • Unsafe code crashes with System.BadImageFormatException when built with latest .NET 7 preview SDK #74306

Closed

  • ودد #74312
  • Cannot run .NET Core 3.1 apps in directories that end in dot on macOS #74105
  • [RC1] System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred. (Relative package path exceeds the maximum length (182): MonoToolChainManifest-7.0.100.7.0.0-rc.1.22417.10,version=56.3.47130,chip=arm64,productarch=neutral\Microsoft.NET.Workload.Mono.ToolChain.Manifest-7.0.100.7.0.0-rc.1.22417.10-arm64.msi.) #74151
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • fix wasm timestamp test by adding 10M tolerance #74317
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO
  • Draft of optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update workloads-build.yml #74313
  • Cleanup current directory tests #74311
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: finish converting all phases to use common post phase dumps and checks #74308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update Xunit to 2.4.2 #74296
    area-Infrastructure
  • [WASM] Fix deadlock when instantiating pthread worker pool #74240
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74290
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #74293
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve performance of Tar library #74281
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Throw if MethodDesc::GetName() returns null #73760
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add guards around some calls to memset to silence ubsan #73953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Roll forward to the latest 6.0.x builds #74288
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] net7.0 + net6.0 workload multitargeting changes #74018
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #74300
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete outdated Visual Basic API #73838
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, api-ready-for-review, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add Rocky Linux RIDs (#74159) #74164
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Disable ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test #74168
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Mono] Only enable Arm intrinsics for full aot mode #74301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Simplify some `ADDR`-related code; fix one bug #74274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid divide by zero in superpmi.py tpdiff #74291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74297
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Reduce allocation when options are passed to fetch #74230
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http

entry.content:

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False warning of property hiding inherited method member #63509
  • `inheritdoc` inside a `param` tag will apply all the `param` tags' text instead of the respective for the parameter #63508

PullRequests

Created

  • Trigger keyword completions in compiler directives when typing #63510
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #63503
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63502
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json_actix #43438
  • Blazor Component doesn't re-render after unhandled exception in event handler #43433
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_nodejs #43430

Closed

  • Component doesn't call StateHasChanged() after event in case of exception #43432
  • When I use EditForm with a model in a .NET MAUI Blazor, I get an error stating "EditForm requires either a Model parameter, or an EditContext parameter, please provide one of these." #43400

PullRequests

Created

  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43437
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43413
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr

Updated

  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1957437 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • Retry a few tests #43422
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suffix original value sproc parameters by default #28817
  • Json: add support for Sqlite provider #28816
  • Json: allow customizing (some) serialization options when creating json, so that it's more readable #28815
  • Foreign key from root parent not set in child entity nested at third level. #28814
  • Calling SaveChanges multiple times sometimes throws with JSON types #28813
  • Support infinity float values in JSON columns #28811
  • Query fails with JSON columns and Include collection #28808

Closed

  • Strings.PlatformNotSupported_DataSqlClient After Upgrade from Ubuntu 20.04 LTS to 22.04 LTS #28788

PullRequests

Created

  • addressing final API review feedback for json columns #28820
  • test part of json collection issue #28819

Merged

  • Add scaffolding DatabaseTrigger class #28801
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Query: API review changes #28795
